history:
This dragon was first introduced in the game 1997 when a map hacker added this creature in to the map in a hidden pick spot in the [[Plains of Havoc]] [[Dragon Lair]], Guido later discovered the dragon and removed it admittedly.

This creature re-appeared in the [[Updates/Update 7.9|7.9 Update]], and can be found as a rare spawn in the [[Pits of Inferno]].
name: Dracola
behaviour: Behaves just like a regular [[Undead Dragon]], except that it is much stronger. It also runs in low [[health]].
strategy: Treat it like a regular [[Undead Dragon]], just keep in mind it can do very high comboes. Have a [[Knight]] stand diagonal, a [[Druid]] to heal the [[Knight]] and as many [[Mage]]s and [[Paladin]]s shoot at '''Dracola'''.
